knimeNode.name: Renderer to Image
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates SVG or PNG cells using a renderer

fullDescription.intro: This node appends a new column that holds SVG or PNG images of the rendered content from another column. You may choose any of the existing renderers for the specific column.
fullDescription.option: Select the column from which you want to render values
Select the renderer that should be used to create the images from the selected column
Size of the creates PNG images (SVG does not need a size)

ports.outPort: The output with the additional column containing the rendered images.
